quick even
Remember to use pycon5 if you can see it (5GHz signal)

As for why netbooks don't work, the way we manage to handle so many active clients (laptops, phones, etc) is to use a lot of relatively low-power APs spread all over the con space. The cards in netbooks are generally much cheaper, and are not capable of picking up these lower-power signals effectively.
WiFi works great for me. Netbook folks had trouble last year too.
